overview: Everything happens in Suite 18. Janine and Asia are happening. Mark and PJ are happening. Asia and Mark are happening. Tony and Kaitlyn are happening. And when it happens in Suite 18, it happens to be very, very hot. Join Bud Lee on his fun filled jaunt to the hotel where only one room really matters. Suite 18. It may not be the Holiday Inn, but it's a holiday in Janine.
title: Suite 18
